Uses of Class
gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.io.SerializationFeature

Packages that use SerializationFeature
Package
Description
gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.io
Provides core functionality for reading and writing instance data to and from bound objects.
gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.io.json
Supports reading and writing JSON instance data.
gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.io.xml
Supports reading and writing XML instance data.
